name: HowtoCommunicateinaMarriage
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: A successful marriage means falling in love with the same person over and over again with every passing time, and the bond between the two people getting stronger as they grow old together. On this aspect marriage communication is very much essential and required for a healthy relationship. There are ups and downs in a relationship before and after a marriage both. A marriage causes many changes in the lives of both the partners and therefore it is essential that instead of silently adjusting to such unseen and untold changes, two people communicate to each other and sort out their share of adjustments, so that later these ‘unsaid’ changes do not become the cause of ‘said’ damage. Find out more about Marriage communication , from our daily Flash Briefings. Just Enable our Skill and …. Enjoy ! The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
